publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4044# Michael Matheson: Larbert Rail Damage—That the Parliament recognises the serious problems being experienced by residents in the Larbert area as a result of heavy coal freight being introduced to the line; understands that this is having a damaging effect on their quality of life as well as their properties; regrets that to date Network Rail has refused to introduce a speed restriction for freight trains on the line, and believes that the problems being experienced by residents in Larbert are unacceptable.
S3M-4044# Larbert Rail Damage (lodged on 1 May 2009) Christine Grahame*, Bill Kidd*, Trish Godman*, John Wilson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Sandra White*
S3M-4044# Larbert Rail Damage (lodged on 1 May 2009) Christina McKelvie*
S3M-4044# Larbert Rail Damage (lodged on 1 May 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4044# Larbert Rail Damage (lodged on 1 May 2009) Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4044# Larbert Rail Damage (lodged on 1 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-4044# Larbert Rail Dam age (lodged on 1 May 2009) Aileen Cam pbell*

S3M-4044# Michael Matheson: Larbert Rail Damage—That the Parliament recognises the serious problems being experienced by residents in the Larbert area as a result of heavy coal freight being introduced to the line; understands that this is having a damaging effect on their quality of life as well as their properties; regrets that to date Network Rail has refused to introduce a speed restriction for freight trains on the line, and believes that the problems being experienced by residents in Larbert are unacceptable. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Bill Kidd, Trish Godman, John Wilson, Hugh O’Donnell, Sandra White, Christina McKelvie, Gil Paterson, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Margaret Mitchell, Aileen Campbell
